languages.text: "Следуя за тобой в пламя битвы, я получу шанс на очищение. А это — все, чего я желаю, все, о чем молю. Праведная гибель — и за ней покой, если Он решит даровать его недостойной дочери".

traits.locale_text: "Следуя за тобой в пламя битвы, я получу шанс на очищение. А это — все, чего я желаю, все, о чем молю. Праведная гибель — и за ней покой, если Он решит даровать его недостойной дочери".

languages.text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."
languages.original_text: "Следуя за тобой в пламя битвы, я получу шанс на очищение. А это — все, чего я желаю, все, о чем молю. Праведная гибель — и за ней покой, если Он решит даровать его недостойной дочери".

traits.locale_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

"Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

"Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

"Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

languages.text: «Seguirle hacia las llamas de la batalla me brindará una oportunidad para la purificación. Y eso es todo lo que quiero, lo único en lo que pienso. Una muerte virtuosa y la paz en la otra vida, si Él tiene a bien concedérsela a su hija descarriada».
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: «Seguirle hacia las llamas de la batalla me brindará una oportunidad para la purificación. Y eso es todo lo que quiero, lo único en lo que pienso. Una muerte virtuosa y la paz en la otra vida, si Él tiene a bien concedérsela a su hija descarriada».

languages.text: 「あなたに付き従い、戦火に身を投じれば、私に浄化の機会が与えられる。私が望むものはそれだけ。皇帝が分不相応な娘に恩赦を与えてくだされば、義にかなった死とその後の平和を授けてくださるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたに付き従い、戦火に身を投じれば、私に浄化の機会が与えられる。私が望むものはそれだけ。皇帝が分不相応な娘に恩赦を与えてくだされば、義にかなった死とその後の平和を授けてくださるだろう」

languages.text: “我愿意跟随你踏入战斗，在烈焰中得到获得救赎的机会。这就是我想要的结果，我唯一想要的结果。我希望能获得正义的死亡与安宁……如果祂愿意原谅祂那卑劣的女儿。”
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: “我愿意跟随你踏入战斗，在烈焰中得到获得救赎的机会。这就是我想要的结果，我唯一想要的结果。我希望能获得正义的死亡与安宁……如果祂愿意原谅祂那卑劣的女儿。”

languages.text: « J'aurai une chance de me purifier en vous suivant dans les flammes du combat. C'est tout ce que je veux, c'est tout ce qui occupe mes pensées : une mort vertueuse et la paix pour l'éternité, pour peu qu'Il daigne l'accorder à Sa fille indigne. »
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: « J'aurai une chance de me purifier en vous suivant dans les flammes du combat. C'est tout ce que je veux, c'est tout ce qui occupe mes pensées : une mort vertueuse et la paix pour l'éternité, pour peu qu'Il daigne l'accorder à Sa fille indigne. »

languages.text: "Wenn ich Euch in die Flammen der Schlacht folge, ist das für mich eine Chance auf Läuterung. Und das ist alles, was ich will. Alles, woran ich denke. Ein rechtschaffener Tod und dann ewiger Frieden, sollte er diesen seiner unwürdigen Tochter gewähren."
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich Euch in die Flammen der Schlacht folge, ist das für mich eine Chance auf Läuterung. Und das ist alles, was ich will. Alles, woran ich denke. Ein rechtschaffener Tod und dann ewiger Frieden, sollte er diesen seiner unwürdigen Tochter gewähren."

languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to his unworthy daughter."

languages.text: "Seninle savaşın alevlerine dalmak bana arınma imkânı tanıyacaktır. Tek istediğim; aklımdaki tek düşünce de bu. Erdemlilikle ölüp huzura kavuşmaktır arzum. İmparator, değersiz kızına layık görürse tabii."
languages.original_text: "Following you into the flames of battle will grant me a chance of purification. And that is all I want, it is all I think about. A righteous death and peace thereafter, should He choose to grant it to His unworthy daughter."

traits.locale_text: "Seninle omuz omuza savaşmak bana arınma imkânı tanıyacaktır. Tek istediğim; aklımdaki tek düşünce de bu. Onurumla ölüp huzura kavuşmaktır arzum. İmparator, değersiz kızına bunu layık görürse tabii."
"Seninle omuz omuza savaşmak bana arınma imkânı tanıyacaktır. Tek istediğim; aklımdaki tek düşünce de bu. Onurumla ölüp huzura kavuşmaktır arzum. İmparator, değersiz kızına bunu layık görürse tabii."
